data.title: Sarah Silverman: Someone You Love
data.meta_description: The official website for Sarah Silverman: Someone You Love on HBO, featuring interviews, schedule information, behind the scenes exclusives, and more.
data.text:
Emmy-winning comedian, actor, writer, and producer Sarah Silverman returns with her first HBO comedy special since 2013â€™s acclaimed Sarah Silverman: We Are Miracles. Filmed at The Wilbur Theater in Boston, Sarah Silverman: Someone You Love features the New England native showcasing her fearless chutzpah.

Produced by JAX Media; directed by Jonathan Krisel; Executive produced by Sarah Silverman, Amy Zvi, Jonathan Krisel, John Skidmore, and Brooke Posch.
